A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi - The VIII episode has all it takes to be a blockbuster. There are some spectacular battle scenes that will blow your mind\, surprising twists in the tale & emotional moments. It starts off from where 'The force awakens' ends. The characters Kylo Ren\, Rey & Luke Skywalker offers good performances.\n\nAny hardcore fans dream come true I'd say.
